title: Bilingual Customer Service (Chinese-English Speaking)
job_overview:
Magahire is looking for a dedicated and bilingual Customer Service Representative fluent in Chinese (Mandarin and/or Cantonese) and English to join our client's growing team in the healthcare industry!

What You’ll Do:
? Respond to patient and client inquiries via phone, email, or chat in both Chinese and English
? Provide clear information about products, orders, appointments, billing, and general support
? Handle concerns with empathy, accuracy, and professionalism
? Maintain and update customer records using CRM tools
? Ensure all interactions meet company and healthcare compliance standards
? Coordinate with internal departments to resolve issues efficiently

What We’re Looking For:
???? Fluency in Chinese (Mandarin and/or Cantonese) and English – both spoken and written
???? A neutral or clear English accent for effective communication with English-speaking clients
???? Previous customer service experience
???? Strong communication and problem-solving skills
???? Comfortable using technology and CRM systems
???? Ability to work independently in a remote setting
???? Experience in medical supplies customer service is a plus, but not required
